EngLawName: Fee-charging Standards for Issuance of Police Criminal Record Certificates
name: 警察刑事紀錄證明收費標準
histories: Enacted and issued by Order Tai-Nei-Ching-Tzu No. 0960871697 of the Ministry of the Interior on Oct. 26, 2007
Amend by Order Tai-Nei-Ching-Tzu No.0990870581 of the Ministry of the Interior on Mar. 30, 2010
Amend by Order Tai-Nei-Ching-Tzu No.10408724053 of the Ministry of the Interior on Sep. 4, 2015

articles.content: The Standards are enacted in accordance with Article 9 of the Act Governing Issuance of Police Criminal Record Certificates and Paragraph 1, Article 10 of the Charges And Fees Act.
Each application for issuance of the police criminal record certificates shall be charged NT$100 per copy, and NT$20 for each additional copy.
The Standards will take effect from the date of promulgation.
